patthana16.49:4.1: Anidassanaappaṭighaṃ hetuñceva sahetukañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nahetu ceva naahetuko ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.49:5.1: Anidassanaappaṭighaṃ sahetukañceva na ca hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho naahetuko ceva nanahetu ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
